STYLE: enable html body full width

This is a refactor of our page template to enable having a body of full
width (and not with max-width=84em as currently). It will be useful for
the front page, that we want to organize occupying all the screen.

DOC: simplify index page

Remove some info from the sidebar

Simplify banner

Update dates

DOC: deconstruct title page

Simplify the title page. Now the CSS styling needs to be done
